casebody.data:
DUNHILL HOLDINGS, LLC
v.
LINDBERG, et al. 313P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 24, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Dunhill Holdings, LLC, et al. Robert E. Zaytoun, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John N. Hutson, Jr., Attorney at Law, N. Cole Williams, Attorney at Law, Durham, Matthew D. Ballew, Attorney at Law, John R. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Lindberg, Tisha L. Anthony D. Taibi, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Massey, Wes. Ronald W. Merritt, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Boone, Derek. Joseph A. Schouten, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Merritt, Hardee. David O. Lewis, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Herndon, Craig.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2018 by Plaintiff/ Counter-Defendant and Third-Party Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2018." Jackson, J. recused
